item.title: 04 Nov 2019 09:34
item.description: The cleanest and most aesthetic airport I’ve seen till date. A strong cup of filter coffee, breezy winds bringing in the smell of an impending rain, a good travel book and birds chirping atop the wooden cieling… couldn’t get any better than this! ðŸ”—
